text: Allah unkalil cilarai cilaraivita celvattil menmaippatutti irukkiran; ivvaru menmaiyakkappattavarkal; tankalutaiya celvattai tankal valakkarankalukku utpattu(t tam atikkattil) iruppavarkalitam kotuttu, avarkalum ivarkal celvattil camamana urimai ullavarkal enru akkivituvatillai (avvarirukka) allahvin arutkotaiyaiya? Ivarkal marukkinranar
